personal.name: Sasmit Sarang
personal.title: Aspiring Frontend Developer
personal.summary: Aspiring Frontend Developer with hands-on experience in building intuitive and responsive UIs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Skilled in optimizing front-end performance, integrating APIs, and enhancing user experience. Familiar with data analysis tools like Power BI and SQL. Passionate about leveraging modern technologies and AI tools to create impactful digital solutions.

education.institution: New Horizon Institute of Technology and Management
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

projects.name: TechStore
projects.description: Built a visually appealing and highly responsive Tech Gadget E-commerce Storefront using HTML, Tailwind CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript, resulting in a seamless user experience across diverse devices and screen sizes.
highlights: Optimized front-end performance, achieving fast load times and smooth interactions
Spearheaded the design and implementation of a robust component library
Features dynamic Header, versatile Product Cards, Light/Dark Mode toggle, and Add-to-Cart system

projects.name: Food Restaurant
projects.description: Developed a fully responsive and interactive food ordering application, delivering a seamless user experience across diverse devices.
highlights: Leveraged React.js for component-based architecture with efficient state management
Integrated Swiggy Public API for real-time restaurant data
Implemented dynamic shopping cart system and detailed restaurant profiles

projects.name: Movieweb
projects.description: Utilized the TMDB API to fetch and display real-time movie and TV show data, showcasing expertise in API integration.
highlights: Implemented lazy loading for optimized performance
Integrated Firebase Authentication for secure user management
Deployed on Firebase Hosting for accessibility and scalability

concepts: AI Tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, BlackBox, Bolt.new, Perplexity, DeepSeek)
